SI_TF_DESC_TEAMFORMATION: TeamFormation shows team formation, useful for grouping with 4+ members.
SI_TF_SETTING_SHOWNOW_TOOLTIP: Show TeamFormation to watch changes in real time.
SI_TF_SETTING_SIZEOPTIONS_TOOLTIP: Set the size and the position of TeamFormation.
SI_TF_SETTING_X_TOOLTIP: Change the X position of TeamFormation.
SI_TF_SETTING_Y_TOOLTIP: Change the Y position of TeamFormation.
SI_TF_SETTING_LOCK_TOOLTIP: Lock TeamFormation position, make it immovable.
SI_TF_SETTING_REFRESHRATE_TOOLTIP: Change the time in milliseconds between refresh of TeamFormation.  |cFFFFFF     20 fps = 50 ms        60 fps = 16 ms      30 fps = 33 ms      100 fps = 10 ms      40 fps = 25 ms|r
SI_TF_SETTING_REFRESHRATE_WARNING: Decreasing this setting may improve performance.
SI_TF_SETTING_CAMROTATION_TOOLTIP: If enabled TeamFormation follows the camera angle.
SI_TF_SETTING_LOGDIST_TOOLTIP: 0 = Linear Adjusts the maximum pin distance.
SI_TF_SETTING_CARDINAL_TOOLTIP: 0 = Hidden Adjusts the transparency of the four cardinal points (North, South, East, & West).
SI_TF_SETTING_SIEGE: Show UI when at siege weapon
SI_TF_SETTING_SIEGE_TOOLTIP: Show TeamFormation when you use siege weapon.
SI_TF_SETTING_PLAYERICON_TOOLTIP: Change the appearance of TeamFormation's icons.
SI_TF_SETTING_YOURALPHA_TOOLTIP: 0 = Hidden Changes the transparency of the player arrow (blue arrow).
SI_TF_SETTING_ROLE_TOOLTIP: Show role icon instead of class icon.
SI_TF_SETTING_HRADDON: [NEW] Customize icon color with the following settings.
SI_TF_SETTING_COLOROPTIONS_TOOLTIP: Customize the color for the icons displayed in TeamFormation.
SI_TF_SETTING_COLORRESET_TOOLTIP: Reset the player and class color.
SI_TF_SETTING_JRULES_PSEUDOADD_TOOLTIP: Add player name at the list and then modify it.
SI_TF_SETTING_JRULES_PICKPSEUDO_TOOLTIP: You need to be in a group! This function will automatically write the player's number in the group.
SI_TF_SETTING_JRULES_PSEUDOCHOICE_TOOLTI: Select the player's name you're looking for.
SI_TF_SETTING_JRULES_COLORCHOICE_TOOLTIP: 0 = Disabled Choose the color for the player icon.
